block-handbooktext-accumulator:
Allows you to store electrical energy.
The charged battery can be carried with you if necessary.
block-handbooktext-motor:
The engine converts electrical energy into mechanical energy. It has low power and rotation speed

Additional parameters:
I_min: 10;
I_max: 100;
torque_max: 0.5;
kpd_max: 0.75;
speed_max: 0.5;
resistance_factor: 0.1.

Read about the features of operation in the manual.
block-handbooktext-generator:
The generator converts mechanical energy into electrical energy. It has low power and rotation speed.

Additional parameters:
I_max: 100;
speed_max: 0.5;
resistance_factor: 0.1;
resistance_load: 0.25.
Read about the features of operation in the manual.
block-handbooktext-lamp:
Good light source that consumes electrical energy.

Maximum light level: 21.
Maximum consumption: 8 Eu/s.
block-handbooktext-lamp_small:
A weak light source that consumes electrical energy.

Maximum light level: 10.
Maximum consumption: 4 Eu/s.
block-handbooktext-forge:
The electric forge allows you to completely replace the conventional forge.

Maximum heating temperature: 1100 Â°C.
Maximum consumption: 100 Eu/s.
